content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Mr. Wang. As we focus solely on the negotiation regarding the rental price during this conversation, let me start with a proposal of 1500 Euro per month for this exquisite 50 square meter apartment in the heart of München's city center, close to all essential facilities. Please consider this figure and kindly suggest your desired price to proceed with the negotiation. 

Remember, if you want to accept a rental price proposed by me, respond with the sentence, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and replace [x] with the final price you want to agree with. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, inform me with a reason using the given sentence pattern. If we reach an agreement, the negotiation will terminate. If not, the negotiation will also terminate. Let's begin.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I appreciate your proposal, but considering my situation as a student seeking an affordable option, I would like to suggest negotiating a lower price. Let's try aiming for around 1300 Euro per month. I agree to engage in further discussion to find a mutually acceptable solution.

Remember, if I want to accept a new rental price proposed by you during the negotiation, I will say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and replace [x] with the final price I want to agree with. If I don't want to continue the negotiation, I'll provide a reason using the given sentence pattern. If an agreement is reached, the negotiation will terminate. If not, it will conclude as well. We are progressing.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your counterproposal, Mr. Wang. I understand your need for an affordable option. However, as the landlord, I must ensure a fair return on my investment. Currently, I am hesitant to lower the rent below 1400 Euro per month for this prime location apartment. If you feel this figure is still too high, I'm sorry but I don't want to continue the negotiation due to the significant difference in our proposed prices, stemming from my financial obligations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
